name.value: Foundation National Institute for Cancer Epidemiology and Registration (NICER)

description.value: The prefix a indicates that classification is first determined at autopsy. **a-Prefix of pTNM (Variable number: 4.6)** in \'NATIONAL CANCER DATA DICTIONARY, V 1.0, Part A, BASIC VARIABLES for Adults, Adolescents, and Children\' see [NICER](https://www.nicer.org/).

definition.value: pTNM classification is not determined at autopsy.
pTNM classification is first determined at autopsy.
